comments:
Build ID: M20070921-1145

Steps To Reproduce:
I'm not sure of the exact steps to repro this, but this exception showed up in my log, and upon inspecting the source for FileEditorInput it looks like this could be caused by a coding error.

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.core.internal.filesystem.InternalFileSystemCore.getStore(InternalFileSystemCore.java:104)
at org.eclipse.core.filesystem.EFS.getStore(EFS.java:350)
at org.eclipse.ui.part.FileEditorInput.getPath(FileEditorInput.java:175) 
...snip...


More information:
FileEditorInput getPath() assumes that is IFile getLocation() returns null that IFile getLocationURI() will return non-null. The stack trace suggests that is not a safe assumption.
Typo: I meant *if* IFile getLocation() returns null...
Dani have you seen this one before?
Just today when reading bug 202780 which contains a similar log.
OK lets keep the link then
